Table of Contents

NAME

SYNOPSIS

DESCRIPTION

The routine sets the process’s file mode creation mask to and returns the previous value of the mask. The 9 low-order access permission bits of are used by system calls, including and to turn off corresponding bits requested in file mode. (See This clearing allows each user to restrict the default access to his files. The default mask value is S_IWGRP|S_IWOTH (022, write access for the owner only). Child processes inherit the mask of the calling process.

RETURN VALUES

The previous value of the file mode mask is returned by the call.

ERRORS

The function is always successful.

SEE ALSO

STANDARDS

The function call is expected to conform to
